TopicTitle: [0.1.1.0] Unexpected rotation and unable to turn off engine after timewarp

Articles.Content:
My interplanetary craft after time warp began to rotate, even its center of mass was on thrust line, even also engine had gimbal and craft had gyrodine. But when I set 1x timewarp, game didn't let me to turn off engine and said that timewarp is more than 1x

UPD: I changed trusses to cargo bays, and it started fly normaly without unexpected rotation and another bug
